Privacy Policy • Flash Guys Cleaning

Your Privacy Matters

At Flash Guys Cleaning, accessible from flashguyscleaning.com, your privacy is one of our main priorities. This Privacy Policy outlines the information we collect and how we use it.

Consent

By using our website, you consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

Information We Collect

Details about the personal information we collect, including:

  • Your name, email, phone number, and any other details provided directly by you.
  • Account registration details, including your contact information.
  • Details from messages and attachments you send us.

How We Use Your Information

We use collected information to:

  • Operate and maintain our website.
  • Understand and improve user experience.
  • Develop new features and services.
  • Communicate for updates, marketing, and support.
  • Prevent fraudulent activity.

Log Files

We use standard log files to track visitor activity for analysis and security purposes.

Cookies and Web Beacons

We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Learn how to manage cookies on your browser here.

Advertising Partners

Our advertising partners include:

  • Google

Your Privacy Rights

CCPA Privacy Rights

California residents have specific rights regarding their personal data. Contact us to exercise these rights.

GDPR Data Protection Rights

EU residents have rights to access, correct, or delete their personal data. Contact us for assistance.

Children's Privacy

We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13. Contact us if you believe your child has shared personal information.
